subject: Gonna need more bread B-for boxes.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Ya can't do boxes non-stop!  I made soft pretzels the week before last, and
they were so good I was splitting them in half and toasting them. So now I
try the same bread in loaves.

F-S
